mention.text: the people in el salvador and panama , `` who are enduring a difficult trial , ''
a document issued by the episcopal secretariat of central america and panama
those who disagree with the policy of the current provisional government
six jesuit priests , who , from their teaching podiums , tried to shape moral and just consciences among the future builders of society
the reality of an underprivileged class
the smuggling of weapons to strengthen subversive movements of various tendencies
